channel.title: Random Background on Client
channel.description:
client.java
[code]calcFlamesPosition();[/code]
comment out both of those in method drawFlames
sprite.java
add [code]static int ran(int min, int max) { return min + (int)(Math.random() * ((max - min) + 1)); }[/code]
IN Sprite(byte, Component)
[code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);[/code]
Comment that out.
At this point I assume your using galkons or pi.
uncomment this
[code]public Sprite(byte abyte0[], Component component) {[/code]
[code]//Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+"mopar.jpg");[/code]
Okay here i have mine in sprite folder in "Init". So its like Sprites/Init. Init will be "NAME THIS FOLDER"
change [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+"mopar.jpg");[/code]
to
[code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(location+"NAME YOUR FOLDER/background"+ran(0,5)+".png");[/code]
Download http://up.ht/natlHB
